Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Peppers Airlie Beach in Airlie Beach, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Airlie Beach Lagoon and Abell Point Marina. This 4.5-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Bicentennial Park and Cannonvale Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 102 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers body treatments and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the aparthotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and laundry facilities. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.
